paper.title: An analysis of buffer paging in virtual storage systems

author.org: IBM Research Laboratory, San Jose, CA

paper.venue: Ibm Journal of Research and Development
paper.abstract: Storage buffers are often used to hold temporary results or data that may be re-referenced in the near future. If these buffers are pagable, searching the buffer may cause a high number of page exceptions. A model of this phenomenon is postulated, and compared with experimental data.
